cardsInDeck.name: Sabotage
cardsInDeck.description: Opponent draws 1 card. See the cards from the opponents hand and then discard 1 card from hand or flipped station card.

cardsInDeck.name: Explosive Missile
cardsInDeck.description: Normal missile.

cardsInDeck.name: Hunter
cardsInDeck.description: Fast (can move the first turn).

cardsInDeck.name: Full Attack
cardsInDeck.description: +1 attack value of your spaceships (not missiles or cannons).

cardsInDeck.name: Defense Cannon
cardsInDeck.description:
Normal cannon.
(Defense cards cannot move)

cardsInDeck.name: Titan
cardsInDeck.description: Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both)

cardsInDeck.name: Avoid
cardsInDeck.description: Discard this card from table to counter card being played.

cardsInDeck.name: Discovery
cardsInDeck.description: Draw 3 cards and the opponent draws 2 cards. [ OR ] Discard 1 card and the opponent discards 2 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Target Missed
cardsInDeck.description: Play this card directly during enemy attack from spaceship (not collision, missile or cannon) to make the attack fail.

cardsInDeck.name: Pursuiter
cardsInDeck.description: Can after first turn be sacrificed instead of attacking to deal 4 damage to target in same zone (collision).

cardsInDeck.name: Luck
cardsInDeck.description:
Counter target card costing 2 or less.
[ OR ] Draw 2 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: The Gladiator
cardsInDeck.description: Normal spaceship.

cardsInDeck.name: Battlestar
cardsInDeck.description: Normal spaceship.

cardsInDeck.name: Destiny Decided
cardsInDeck.description: You cannot play any card. The opponent can only play 1 card during their turn and this card cannot be an event (orange) card.

cardsInDeck.name: Energy Shield
cardsInDeck.description: Protects base station. (You can only have one Energy Shield in play at the same time.)

cardsInDeck.name: Good Karma
cardsInDeck.description: Draw 3 extra cards in your draw phase, then after your draw phase discard 1 card from your hand.

cardsInDeck.name: Perfect Plan
cardsInDeck.description: Search for a card from the draw pile, discard pile or station cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.

cardsInDeck.name: Discovery
cardsInDeck.description: Draw 3 cards and the opponent draws 2 cards. [ OR ] Discard 1 card and the opponent discards 2 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Target Missed
cardsInDeck.description: Play this card directly during enemy attack from spaceship (not collision, missile or cannon) to make the attack fail.

cardsInDeck.name: Disturbing Sensor
cardsInDeck.description:
路 Enemy missiles can't move or attack.
路 If opponent after draw phase has more   than 1 card in hand, he or she           discards a card.

cardsInDeck.name: Perfect Plan
cardsInDeck.description: Search for a card from the draw pile, discard pile or station cards and put it into your hand. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.

cardsInDeck.name: EMP Missile
cardsInDeck.description: Destroys Energy Shield or paralyzes spaceship (turn the card and it cannot do anything until repaired).

cardsInDeck.name: The Shade
cardsInDeck.description: The Shade can only be attacked if it has been attacking the last turn.

cardsInDeck.name: Explosive Missile
cardsInDeck.description: Normal missile.

cardsInDeck.name: Excellent work
cardsInDeck.description:
Put down this card as an extra station card.
[ OR ] Draw 3 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Luck
cardsInDeck.description:
Counter target card costing 2 or less.
[ OR ] Draw 2 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Missiles Launched
cardsInDeck.description: Find 2 missile cards (red cards) from your draw or discard pile and play them without cost. Shuffle the draw pile if searched.

cardsInDeck.description:
Put down this card as an extra station card.
[ OR ] Draw 3 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Target Missed
cardsInDeck.description: Play this card directly during enemy attack from spaceship (not collision, missile or cannon) to make the attack fail.

cardsInDeck.description:

cardsInDeck.name: Small Repair Ship
cardsInDeck.description:
Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 3 other damage.
Fast (can move the first turn).

cardsInDeck.name: EMP Missile
cardsInDeck.description: Destroys Energy Shield or paralyzes spaceship (turn the card and it cannot do anything until repaired).

cardsInDeck.name: Nuclear Missile
cardsInDeck.description: Slow (each turn can either move or attack but not both)

cardsInDeck.description: Discard this card from table to counter card being played.

cardsInDeck.name: Sabotage
cardsInDeck.description: Opponent draws 1 card. See the cards from the opponents hand and then discard 1 card from hand or flipped station card.

cardsInDeck.name: Big Repair Ship
cardsInDeck.description: Can instead of doing attack repair 1 station damage or 5 other damage.

cardsInDeck.name: Supernova
cardsInDeck.description: All cards except station cards are destroyed. Each player receives 3 station damage.

cardsInDeck.name: Over Capacity
cardsInDeck.description:
You have no maximum hand size.
In your action phase you may look at and take to your hand bottom row station cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Excellent work
cardsInDeck.description:
Put down this card as an extra station card.
[ OR ] Draw 3 cards.

cardsInDeck.name: Fatal Error
cardsInDeck.description: Destroy any card in play with action cost X.

cardsInDeck.description: Fast (can move the first turn).

cardsInDeck.description: Protects base station. (You can only have one Energy Shield in play at the same time.)

Destroy any card when this enters play.

cardsInDeck.description:
You have no maximum hand size.

cardsInDeck.name: Neutralization
cardsInDeck.description:
No other duration card has any effect.
Remove from play to destroy another duration card.

cardsInDeck.description: Draw 5 cards and then discard 1 card from your hand.
